Name: Action Alien: Survival
About the game: With a car running out of fuel in a petrol station, fight hordes of aliens coming from all sides and collect all petrol cans to leave the place ! Entirely destructible petrol station with 9 weapons to grab ranging from the revolver, shotgun, tommy gun to the grenade launcher and playable in daylight or at night . 10 achievements to unlock, support for Xbox-like gamepads and Ultra HD resolution (4K).
